content.rendered:
Directed by Gitanjali Rao

Written by Nadja Dumouchel. Asad Hussain. Gitanjali Rao

Cast Cyli Khare(Kamala (voice)). Amit Deondi(Salim (voice)). Gargi Shitole(Tara (voice)). Makrand Deshpande(Mike / Pimp (voice)). Amardeep Jha(Ms. D’Souza (voice)). Veerendra Saxena(Kamala’s Grandfather (voice) (as Virendra Saxena)). Shishir Sharma(Anthony Pereira (voice)). Rajeev Raj(Mishra Ji (voice)). Anurag Kashyap(Raja Khan (voice)). Geetanjali Kulkarni(Flower Seller / Bar Dancer (voice)). Chhaya Kadam(Bar Dancer / Actress on Screen). Kalyanee Mulay(Salim’s Mother). Avinash Walzade(Watchman at Pyaasa Bar). Ashwath Bhatt(Salim’s Father). Viswanathan Sridhar(Janta Bar Owner). Vallabh Bhingarde(Police Inspector / Constable). Nandkishore Pandey(Heroine’s Father on TV Screen)

Language Hindi

Producers Kirsty Bell. Tessa Inkelaar. Rohit Khattar. Serge Lalou. Anand Mahindra. Phil McKenzie. Rhea Naidu. Soumitra Ranade. Gitanjali Rao. Deborah Sathe. Charlotte Uzu.

Production Cinestaan Film Company. Les Films d’Ici. Goldfinch
